metadata.title: CVE-2022-24729 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: CKEditor4 is an open source what-you-see-is-what-you-get HTML editor.CKEditor4 prior to version 4.18.0 contains a vulnerability in the `dialog`plugin. The vulnerability allows abuse of a dialog input validator regularexpression, which can cause a significant performance drop resulting in abrowser tab freeze. A patch is available in version 4.18.0. There arecurrently no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ckeditor3 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ldap-account-manager package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
request-tracker4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
